strategy_config: {'name': 'heavy_class_weights', 'description': 'Heavy weighting for unreliable source class', 'epochs': 4, 'learning_rate': 2e-05, 'batch_size': 1, 'max_length': 512, 'weight_decay': 0.01, 'class_weight_multiplier': 10.0, 'use_focal_loss': False, 'oversample': False}
